com.team23.weather.mars

Class MarsWeatherClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.mars.MarsWeatherClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMarsWeatherClient

    public class MarsWeatherClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMarsWeatherClient
    A MarsWeatherClient that implements the IMarsWeatherClient interface. This class connects to the website "http://marsweather.ingenology.com/" in order to view archived weather information collected by NASA's Curiosity rover. The weather information is stored in JSON format, so this class calls JsonSerializer to format the weather into a MarsForecast object. Finally, this class returns the MarsForecast to be displayed to the user.
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen
    See Also:
    IMarsWeatherClient, MarsForecast, ISerializer, HttpClient, MarsWeatherResponse, Report
